### 💫 About Me
- 🌱 Currently learning **Web Development, Data Science & AI**  
- 💬 Ask me about **Java, Python, Web Apps, Git, Open Source**  
- ⚡ Fun fact: **I love building interactive web projects and animations!**  
- 🎯 Goal: **To grow as a full-stack developer and contribute to meaningful projects**
